attributes.action: Ensure more indepth Puppy 1st Health Checks... 4-6 weeks old
attributes.additional_details:
To make sure the heart is operating as it should be and to protect the new owner from suffering heart Ache... 
I lost my puppy aged 9 and a half weeks old because only 2 of the 4 heart Chambers were working  had her heart  beat been listened to for a bit.longer than 10-30 seconds then this heart condition would have been  picked up and the breeder notified... 
There has been unnecessary heartache and expense caused nit.to mention whether the puppy had suffered any unnecessary pain...
attributes.background: I would.like the government to make law  that all Dog litters are properly Vet checked at 4-6weeks old..  To listen to the puppies heart for longer than 3 -10 seconds. It should be for at least a minimum of 1-2 mins

rejection.details:
We are sorry to hear about the death of your puppy, but exactly how the health if puppies is checked is a matter for veterinarians, not the Government or House of Commons.

You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Require All Puppies to Be Sold with a 'Pup & Mum' Veterinary Health Check Record: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598263
